welcome_message_body: Welcome to Islip, where the charm of our historic downtown and beautiful beaches await you. Explore our vibrant community and enjoy all that Islip has to offer!

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in Bay Shore.
restaurants.address: 19 Bay Shore Rd, Bay Shore, NY 11706

restaurants.name: Our Little Italy Pizza & Pasta
restaurants.description: Our Little Italy Pizza & Pasta is a italian restaurant located in West Islip.

restaurants.name: Izumi Hibachi
restaurants.description: Izumi Hibachi is a japanese restaurant located in Holbrook.

restaurants.name: Texas Roadhouse
restaurants.description: Texas Roadhouse is a steakhouse located in Deer Park.

restaurants.name: Bagel Buzz
restaurants.description: Bagel Buzz is a bagel shop located in West Islip.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and duty-free shopping.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and features a variety of retail and dining options.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport is a small but modern facility with a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport is available for use by private and charter aircraft, offering a luxurious and exclusive travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
